channel.title: Help please
channel.description: I'm currently using the source allstar-scape. When i try to weild certain items, it either says"you need 1 prayer" about 5 times per click, or it says like for d legs"you need 60 def to weild this item"..and i have 99 def. Weilding items is freaked up, how can i fix this?

item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Tehh Tehh
item.description:
@Tehh wrote:

Silab servers are VERY glitchy, I reccomend you use a Delta based one, they’re more fun and also more stable

Read full topic

item.title: Help please

item.description:
